Spot and asked, "Why are you sad?"
Spot told the big bird about the sunset and how he could not reach it. The big bird said, "I can help you!" So, the big bird picked up Spot with its strong feet. They flew up high in the sky, closer to the sunset.
Spot was so happy to see the sunset up close. He thanked the big bird for helping him. From that day on, Spot and the big bird became best friends. They played together every day, and Spot never quit trying new things again.

The doctor arrived and began examining the daughter. He shone a bright light into her eyes and asked her to count to ten. Then, he asked her to draw a picture. Her creative drawing had the doctor and the daughter playing ball in the park.
